de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.datatables

Interface IDataTableController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IListController<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTableController, DataTableClubsController, DataTableLeagueGamesController, DataTableOtherEventsController, DataTablePeopleController, DataTableRefereesController, DataTableTournamentsController, DataTableTraineesController

    public interface IDataTableController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>
extends IListController<T>

    Interface for the data table scene controller.
